org.sql: SELECT account_pins.target_account_id FROM account_pins WHERE account_pins.account_id = "$1" AND account_pins.target_account_id IN ("$2", "$3")

rewrites.sql: SELECT account_pins.target_account_id FROM account_pins WHERE account_pins.account_id = "$1" AND account_pins.target_account_id IN ("$2", "$3") LIMIT 1
